pr_title: Fix NPE in adding accelerator tag

timeline.author: chtyim
chtyim

replies.bodyText: I am not sure if I am propogating it correctly. Need to debug further to check what is null here. This is to unblock.
replies.author: greeshmaswaminathan

replies.bodyText: I don't think it can be null. I think it's only the requirements is null.
replies.author: chtyim

timeline.message: Fix NPE in adding accelerator tag
CDAP-17406 Use custom deserialization for ApplicationClass to consider new field

timeline.bodyText: You should have a codec class that implements both json serializer and deserializer
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: Annotate parameter with @Nullable if null is expected
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: Please be consistent with the ordering of parameters between methods.
timeline.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText: Also, try to be consistent for the method (e.g. it takes JsonObject and get the field in the getConfigSchema method, while in here, it is expected the caller to get the field and pass it in).
replies.author: chtyim

timeline.message: CDAP-17406 Use custom codec for ApplicationClass to consider new field
